resources.string: Picture of Maqam Echahid Monument found in Algeria, it was unveiled in 1982.
Picture of Mount Kilomanjaro found in Tanzania, it is the highest mount in Africa with an elevation of 19,341 feet.
Picture of Valley Of Kings found in Egypt west of the Nile River.
Picture of Chichen Iten found in Mexico, it was built by the Maya people of the Terminal Classic.
